description: knock knock jokes with binary classification by jon of whether the joke was 'funny' to a six year old or 'lame'

corpus.label: funny
corpus.data: Knock knock. Who’s there? Cow says. Cow says who? No, a cow says mooooo!

corpus.label: funny
corpus.data: Knock knock. Who’s there? Cash. Cash who? No thanks, I’ll have some peanuts.

corpus.label: lame
corpus.data: Knock knock. Who’s there? I smell mop. I smell mop who? Ew.

corpus.label: funny
corpus.data: Knock knock. Who’s there? Spell. Spell who? Okay, okay: W. H. O.

corpus.label: lame
corpus.data: Knock knock. Who’s there? Mikey. Mikey who? Mikey doesn’t work so help me out, would you?

corpus.label: lame
corpus.data: Knock knock. Who’s there? Some. Some who? Some day you’ll recognize me, hopefully.
